item.title: Mollic epipedon thickness requirement (part 1)
item.description: [This functionality has been live in aqp since version 1.21+] Here is a demonstration of some new functionality I am working on for evaluating taxonomic criteria with aqp. mollic.thickness.requirement calculates the minimum thickness of the materials meeting other requirements for a mollic epipedon, per criterion 6 in U.S. Soil Taxonomy (12th edition).
